      • calcAllStats

        public void calcAllStats()
        Calculates all the stats. Five number summary Mean and standard deviation IQR and range Z-scores

      • getAllStats

        public double[][] getAllStats()
        Gives the stats
        Returns:
        [0] is data [1] is deviations [2] is squared deviations [3] is z-scores [4] is five number summary [5][0] is mean [5][1] is standard deviation [5][2] is iqr [5][3] is range
